pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Bathes you or a nearby target in an aura that heals over time.$(br)$(l)Magical School:$() $(9)Grace$()$(br)$(l)Mana Cost:$() 24$(br)$(l)Cooldown:$() 40.0 seconds$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/opaline_scepter)Opaline Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/iridescent_scepter)Iridescent Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/lustrous_scepter)Lustrous Scepter$()$(br)$(l)Tier:$() 1
